meanings.definition: In a mystical or spiritual sense, relating to anagogically.
meanings.sent1: The anagogically symbols in the story represented deeper spiritual meanings.
meanings.sent2: She had an anagogically experience during meditation that filled her with peace.

meanings.sent5: The anagogically teachings of the wise old monk stayed with the young apprentice forever.

meanings.definition: Interpretation of a text or work of art in an anagogical manner.
meanings.sent1: The anagogically of the poem revealed hidden messages about life and death.
